```{python}
import pandas as pd

name_dict = {'train_setting_0': 'Regular',
             'train_setting_1': 'Always both with queen',
             'train_setting_2': 'Never only one with bishop pair',
             'train_setting_3': 'Never only one with queen',
             'train_setting_4': 'Never only one with knight pair',}

results = pd.read_csv('../tournaments/ratings/ratings_22.csv')
results['Description'] = results['PLAYER'].map(name_dict)
results['Delta'] = results['RATING'] -results['RATING'].max() 
results[['Description', 'RATING', 'POINTS', 'Delta']]
```
